body.name: ANJ Modern Arm Chair, Mid-Century Modern Accent Chair Upholstered Lounge Chair with Pillow and Solid Wood Frame, Linen Fabric Comfy Chairs for Living Room
features: Modern Accent Chair with Back Pillow: Curving arms and flared legs for an iconically mid-century modern look, slightly curved backrest relaxes back muscles and relieves fatigue, and breathable linen-look fabric offers you comfort, and the extra back pillow can support your back better

Supportive Back and Seat: Upholstered back made from a highly resilient sponge, the solid backrest provides support for your spine. Its padded seat is soft for ultimate comfort, with a gently slanted design, which can distribute pressure evenly when you lean on it

Stable and Durable Frame: Solid wood frame construction can easily support the weight of 300lbs. And sturdy wood legs with anti-skid padding under the feet to keep balance and protect your floors from scuffs and scratches

Perfect Size and Wide Application: Overall Dimension: 26"W x 32"D x 29"H, Seat Size:23"W x 22"D. Our fabric armchair is suitable for bedroom, living room, balcony, office, etc. You can enjoy your own leisure time on it

Easy Assembly and Customer Service: Assemble instructions and accessories are included in the box, easy to assemble. We provides free exchange for installation problems, damaged and missing parts with 1-year warranty guarantee, feel free to contact us for any purchase

Mid Century Accent Chair lounge chair ANJHOME mid-century Rocking accent chair made from sturdy wood, soft fabric and filled with the high-density sponge to provide you a safe and comfortable experience. Simple, classic styling makes this accent chair perfect for living room, bedroom, home office or library, which allows you to enjoy all that your room has to offer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, solid chair
reviews.reviewText: So happy with the look and quality of this chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I took a shot at ordering this chair when there were no reviews. This chair exceeded all expectations, and it is so beautiful! It looks exactly like the picture, and it was very easy to put together. I will soon be buying a second one to complete my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Screws are NOT LONG ENOUGH!!!
reviews.reviewText: I do have mixed feelings about this chair so here's my first thought I love love love love this chair the looks are quite elegant but also very Charming I adore everything about it except I can't finish putting it together because the screws are not quite long enough, I measured it and four centimeters that's it. you put this much money into a product you expect the right sized hardware, I am so frustrated, I really needed this chair I rent a room and sitting on my bed is kicking my ass. I hate bitching about products but that's what not to take this thing together gave me so much anxiety, I literally cried with disappointment so I'm going to figure something out I'm going to have to go down and buy four screws and I shouldn't have to do that, if you happen to get this product and your screws fit that is awesome and hopefully I can get it aligned.I really don't like design. so honestly once I get this figured out I'm hoping the chair will be as comfortable as it looks I love the little pillow that came with I'll come back with some photos of the finished result, and I believe it's going to be a fantastic chair and I still think it is worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s comfortable and looks great.
reviews.reviewText: The alignment of screws and holes were a challenge. One piece of wood frame broke during assembly. The quality is so so, the look is great. Also, it is surprisingly comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are beautiful
reviews.reviewText: They are perfect, super easy to assemble and are perfect for our space. Looks just like the pottery barn expensive version. Perfect
